caption:
🚀 The last time I had a launch I was under the weather for a month afterwards. That’s not happening this time! I’m so excited to be taking these two products during this launch! 

🧠 Focus by @evohemp is helping me with the massive amounts of editing I’m doing over here. Turning multiple 90 minute workshops into 15+ easy to consume videos takes time AND focus! 

💆‍♀️ Immune by @evohemp + intention + listening to my body is going to prevent me from feeling under the weather after this launch. I even booked a 2 hour massage right after my workshop and then I fly to Puerto Rico 2 days later to relax and rejuvenate! 

🥳 When @evohemp reached out to see if I wanted to try their products I read their story and it was an immediate hell yes! 

🌱They source their hemp from a Minnesota based and farmer owned cooperative focusing on bringing equity and innovation to Black, Indigenous and other socially disadvantaged farmers. 

🌞The co-op also teaches members the basics of sustainable farming to help regenerate the soil and reduce climate damage.

✨ Go check them out!
